DOC.brief_summary: To compare sequential dinoprostone oxytocin induction labor term intact membrane unripe cervix two simultaneous regimen . Our aim confirm finding small trial add data fetal safety .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Agent Randomized Trial Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-blinded , three arm randomize trial 3 site . Entry criterion : > 36 week ’ singleton , cephalic gestation intact membrane unripe cervix ( Bishop ’ score < 6 ) . Study arm : 1 ) dinoprostone vaginal insert ( Cervidil ) 12 hour follow oxytocin , 2 ) dinoprostone vaginal insert ( Cervidil ) 12 hour simultaneous oxytocin , 3 ) intracervical dinoprostone gel ( Prepidil ) ( one dose ) follow immediate oxytocin . Primary outcome measure rate vaginal delivery < 24 hour . Secondary outcome randomization delivery interval , rate cesarean delivery ( CD ) non reassure fetal status ( NRFS ) rate uterine hyperstimulation .
DOC.criteria: > = 36 week gestation Singleton fetus Cephalic presentation Intact membranes unripe cervix ( Bishop score < 6 ) Multifetal gestation Rupture membranes Ripe cervix ( Bishop score > 6 ) Active labor Contraindication vaginal delivery Previous uterine surgery Noncephalic presentation Fetal macrosomia
